articles.content: Assembly theory predicts that objects like us cant arise in isolation that some complex objects can only occur in conjunction with others. This makes intuitive sense; the universe could never produce… [+4671 chars]

articles.author: Tomasz Nowakowski
articles.title: New variable star detected by Chinese astronomers - Phys.org
articles.description: Using the Nanshan One-meter Wide-field Telescope (NOWT), astronomers from China have performed a photometric survey of the old open cluster NGC 188. In result, they identified many variable stars, one of which was detected for the first time. The finding was …
